body_html: While there was workaround for importing numpy before tensorflow, if you want a solution which works so you can run tensorboard. (on ubuntu) pip uninstall scipy (and numpy) and then apt-get install python-scipy (and python-numpy). This will cause compatible versions of both to be installed which match the binary file provided.
body_text: While there was workaround for importing numpy before tensorflow, if you want a solution which works so you can run tensorboard.  (on ubuntu) pip uninstall scipy (and numpy) and then apt-get install python-scipy (and python-numpy).  This will cause compatible versions of both to be installed which match the binary file provided.
body: While there was workaround for importing numpy before tensorflow, if you want a solution which works so you can run tensorboard.  (on ubuntu) `pip uninstall scipy` (and numpy) and then `apt-get install python-scipy` (and python-numpy).  This will cause compatible versions of both to be installed which match the binary file provided.
